          <title>
            <string language="en">Torque on a driving wheel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drehkraft auf einem Antriebsrad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couple sur une roue pilotante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Torque em uma roda da movimentação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coppia di torsione su una ruota di azionamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ροπή σε μια οδηγώντας ρόδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esfuerzo de torsión en un rodillo impulsor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the opposing torques caused by the car engine and the brakes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cars</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die entgegensetzenden 
Drehkräfte, die durch die Automaschine und die Bremsen verursacht 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les couples 
d'opposition provoqués par le moteur de voiture et les freins.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os torques opondo-se 
causados pelo motor do carro e pelos freios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le coppie di torsione
avversarie causate dal motore dell'automobile e dai freni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αντιτιθέμενες ροπές που 
προκαλούνται από τη μηχανή αυτοκινήτων και τα φρένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los esfuerzos de 
torsión de oposición causados por el motor del coche y los frenos.</string>
          </description>
